suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more detailed line work in the background elements such as the sky, clouds, and grass. This can be achieved by incorporating varied line weights and patterns to create a sense of depth and texture. Additionally, refining the lines on the characters' clothing and hair can add more definition and interest. Pay attention to the tiger's fur and the meat piece, as adding more intricate lines can make these elements stand out more. Overall, focusing on these areas will improve the overall texture and definition of the artwork.
